item.title: Using GitHub Pages with Jekyll!
item.description: I’m switching to GitHub pages with Jekyll. There are several reasons behind my decision: Faster! - static HTML is much faster than my old WordPress blog. Lighter - Jekyll is much more minimalistic than WordPress, it has all I need and in the same time it is not too much. I can use VIM! - I can use my favorite text editor in order to: configure my blog write blog posts Reliable hosting - last a couple of yeas I pay for hosting, which is not reliable enough.
